alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hardin and east central Breckinridge Counties through 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/... At 628 PM EDT/528 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Hardinsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Hardin and east central Breckinridge Counties, including the following locations... Vine Grove, Dyer, Four Corners, High Plains, Vertrees, High Plains Corner, Custer, Rineyville, Kraft and Big Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for central Kentucky.
